title: Class of Mum and Dad
overview: Class of Mum and Dad will see a group of 19 parents go back to school for half a term. The series is filmed at Blackrod Primary School in Bolton. Under the watchful eyes of Principal Ian Dryburgh and class teacher Kath Mead, the grown ups will have to get to grips with the year six curriculum. The parents will have to follow every aspect of their children's routine for half a term, from SAT tests to school dinners.
